title: A Uniform Resource Name (URN) Namespace for the TV-Anytime Forum
abstract:
This document describes a Uniform Resource Name (URN) namespace that
is engineered by the TV-Anytime Forum for naming persistent resources
published by the TV-Anytime Forum including the TV-Anytime Forum
Standards, XML (Extensible Markup Language) Document Type Definitions,
XML Schemas, Namespaces, and other documents.  This memo provides information for the Internet community.
